note.title: Version Information
note.para: &susemgr; 3.1 was originally released as a SLES 12 SP2 extension. With the next maintenance update (December 2018), &susemgr; 3.1 will be based on SLES 12 SP4 and support SLE 12 SP4 clients officially. In the following sections and chapters, it is highly recommended to use SLE 12 SP4 instead of SP2 or SP3.

sect1.title: SLES 12 KVM Requirements
sect1.para: This chapter provides the required (kvm) settings for installation of &sls; 12 media as the base for the &susemgr; 3.1. A kernel virtual machine (kvm) combined with Virtual Machine Manager (virt-manager) will be used as a sandbox for this installation.
Enter the following settings when creating a new virtual machine using virt-manager.

entry.para: Local install media (ISO image or CDROM)
230 GB split between 4 GB swap and 130 GB mounted at /var/spacewalk/ (Virtual Disk 1) and 50 GB mounted at /var/lib/pgsql (Virtual Disk 2)

sect1.title: SLES 12 KVM Settings
sect1.para: This section provides guidance on installation of &susemgr; utilizing the full installation media with KVM and virt-manager. This section assumes you have previously setup an account with SCC and downloaded the SLES 12 full installation media.

step.para: In virt-manager select File then New Virtual Machine.
Choose Local install media (ISO image or CDROM).
Ensure Use ISO Image is selected then click Browse and locate the full SLES 12 image you downloaded from your SCC account.
Configure your machine with at least 4096 MB RAM and a minimum of 2 CPUs.

Create a storage device with a minimum of 230 GB storage space for the installation. During the partitioning setup of the SLES 12 installation this disk should be partitioned into a 4 GB swap a 130 GB partition (or a dedicated virtual disk) for /var/spacewalk/ (XFS) and an additional 50 GB partition (or a dedicated virtual disk) for /var/lib/pgsql/ (XFS). The remaining storage space will be used by the operating system. Select Finish to begin the installation.

sect1.para: Installation of &sls; 12 will begin. For more information on completing an installation of &sls; 12, see .

sect1.title: Selecting the &susemgr; 3.1 Extension
sect1.para: During the &sls; 12 installation you will be presented with the Extension and Module Selection (see ). Select the &susemgr; 3.1 Extension and then complete the &sls; 12 installation.
